qas.question: Folk musicians are not commonly what?
What music comes from those commonly trained by oral tradition?
Dovrak has used what type of themes to impart a nationalist flavor?
Who used specific themes lifted from folk-music?

context: Composers of classical music have often made use of <a1_0>folk music<a1_0/> (music created by musicians who are commonly not <a0_0>classically trained<a0_0/>, often from a purely oral tradition). Some composers, like Dvořák and Smetana, have used <a2_0>folk<a2_0/> themes to impart a nationalist flavor to their work, while others like <a3_0>Bartók<a3_0/> have used specific themes lifted whole from their folk-music origins.
